headline.main: The American Disease; Origins of Narcotic Control. By David F. Musto, M.D. 354 pp. New Haven: Yale University Press. $10.95.

keywords.value: BOOK THE AMERICAN DISEASE. ORIGINS OF NARCOTIC CONTROL

docs.lead_paragraph: Although few in number, the historians of narcotic control in America have been no less partisan than politicians, reformers, undercover agents, cure-peddlers, prohibitionists and civil libertarians locked in the historical fray.
